::Rixer::

He brought his hands up protecting his face. The blade sliced through a
bit of his arms causeing a lot of pain. The other one slashing across
his waist. Rixer droped in pain, but tryed to sweep Speed Vipers legs
out. 

While this was going on, Hot Rod manuvered around, getting behind Speed
Viper. He fired a missile right at the back of Speed Viper.
